oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Attack on Irving Prison
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: sketches; Civil War; Forrest, Nathan Bedford; Irving Block; prisons; 1860s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Forrest's Raid Into Memphis - Rebel Attack on the Irving Prison." One of three sketches by George H. Ellsbury regarding the August 22, 1864, raid by General Nathan Bedford Forrest.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ellsbury, George H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Illustrations from Harper's Weekly Newspaper and Frank Leslie's Illustrated Newspaper
